text: @narendramodi COVID-19 Coronavirus / India Luck Down  I'm a very gory man for her.  I need your help.  I eat gazelle and eat food. If you do not work, you will not be able to eat, so you help me with some money.  UPI - ID => 9083411958b @ paytm
